1.verse: Ke kaloku kwathi ngemihla yokulawula kwabagwebi, kwabakho indlala elizweni. Yahamba indoda yaseBhetelehem yakwaYuda, yaza yaphambukela elizweni lakwaMowabhi, yona nomkayo, noonyana bayo bobabini.

2.verse: Ke igama laloo ndoda lalinguElimeleki, igama lomkayo linguNahomi; amagama oonyana bayo babengooMalon noKiliyon,  bengamaEfrata aseBhetelehem yakwaYuda. Baya ke elizweni lakwaMowabhi, baba khona.

3.verse: Wafa uElimeleki indoda kaNahomi; washiywa ke yena noonyana bakhe bobabini.

4.verse: Bazeka abafazi abangamaMowabhikazi; igama lomnye lalinguOrpa, igama lomnye lalinguRute; bahlala khona iminyaka eseshumini.

5.verse: Bafa kananjalo bobabini ooMalon noKiliyon; washiywa ke loo mfazi ngoonyana bakhe bobabini nayindoda yakhe.

6.verse: Wesuka yena noomolokazana bakhe, ebuya elizweni lakwaMowabhi; ngokuba weva eselizweni lakwaMowabhi, ukuba uYehova ubavelele abantu bakhe ngokubanika isonka.

7.verse: Waphuma kuloo ndawo abekuyo, enoomolokazana bakhe bobabini;  wahamba ngendlela ebuyela ezweni lakwaYuda.

8.verse: Wathi uNahomi koomolokazana bakhe bobabini, Hambani,  nibuyele elowo endlwini yonina; uYehova makanenzele inceba,  njengoko nenze ngako kubafi nakum.

9.verse: UYehova makaninike nifumane indawo yokuphumla, elowo endlwini yendoda yakhe. Wabanga; baliphakamisa ilizwi labo,  balila.

10.verse: Bathi kuye, Hayi, siya kubuyela nawe kubantu bakowenu.

11.verse: Wathi uNahomi, Buyani, zintombi zam; kungani na ukuba nihambe nam? Ndisenoonyana yini na embilinini wam, ukuze babe ngamadoda kuni?

12.verse: Buyani, zintombi zam; hambani, ngokuba sendikwaluphalele ukuba nendoda. Khona ukuba ndibe ndisithi, Ndisenethemba,  nokuba bendithe ndaba ngonendoda ngobu busuku, nokuba bendithe ndazala oonyana,

13.verse: beniya kuthi ngenxa yoko nilinde bade bakhule, yini na?  Beniya kuthi ngenxa yoko nizibambe ningabi namadoda, yini na?  Hayi, zintombi zam; ngokuba kukrakra kunene kum ngenxa yenu,  kuba isandla sikaYehova siphumelene nam.

14.verse: Baliphakamisa ilizwi labo, babuya balila. UOrpa wamanga uninazala; ke yena uRute wanamathela kuye.

15.verse: Wathi yena, Uyabona, umkhuluwakazi wakho ubuyele kubantu bakowabo, nakoothixo bakowabo; buya nawe, ulandele umkhuluwakazi wakho.

16.verse: Wathi uRute, Musa akundibongoza ngokuthi mandikushiye,  ndibuye, ndingakulandeli; ngokuba apho uya khona, ndiya kuya nam; apho uya kuthi vu khona, ndiya kuthi vu khona; abantu bakowenu baya kuba ngabantu bam, uThixo wakho abe nguThixo wam;

17.verse: apho ufela khona, ndiya kufela khona, ndingcwatyelwe khona.  Makenjenje uYehova kum, aphinde ukwenjenje: kukufa kodwa okuya kundahlula nawe.

18.verse: Wabona ukuba uzimisele ukuhamba naye, wayeka ukuthetha kuye.

19.verse: Bahamba ke bobabini, bada bafika eBhetelehem. Kwathi, xa bangenayo eBhetelehem, wazamazama wonke umzi ngenxa yabo,  bathi, NguNahomi na lo?

20.verse: Wathi kubo, Musani ukuthi ndinguNahomi; yithini ndinguMara,  ngokuba uSomandla undenze ndakrakra kunene.

21.verse: Ndemka mna ndizele; ke uYehova undibuyisa ndilambatha. Yini na ukuba nithi ndinguNahomi; uYehova engqinile nje ngam,  uSomandla endenzele ububi nje.

22.verse: Wabuya ke uNahomi enoRute umMowabhikazi, umolokazana wakhe,  owabuya elizweni lakwaMowabhi; bafika bona eBhetelehem ekuqalekeni kokuvunwa kwerhasi.

1.verse: Ke kaloku uNahomi ebenesihlobo sendoda yakhe, indoda esisityebi emzalwaneni kaElimeleki; igama layo libe linguBhohazi.

2.verse: Wathi uRute umMowabhikazi kuNahomi, Makhe ndiye entsimini,  ndibhikice izikhwebu emva kwalowo ndiya kubabalwa nguye. Wathi kuye, Hamba, ntombi yam.

3.verse: Wahamba waya, wabhikica entsimini emva kwabavuni. Ithamsanqa lakhe lawela phezu kwesahlulo sentsimi kaBhohazi,  obengowomzalwane kaElimeleki.

4.verse: Wathi gqi uBhohazi, evela eBhetelehem, wathi kubavuni,  UYehova makabe nani. Bathi kuye, UYehova makakusikelele.

5.verse: Wathi uBhohazi kwindodana yakhe ephethe abavuni, Yekabani na le nkazana?

6.verse: Yaphendula indodana ephethe abavuni, yathi. Yinkazana engumMowabhikazi, efike noNahomi, bevela elizweni lakwaMowabhi;

7.verse: yathi ke, Makhe ndibhikice, ndibuthe phakathi kwezithungu emva kwabavuni; yeza ke, yema kwakusasa kwada kwangoku;  ukuhlala kwayo endlwini kukancinane.

8.verse: Wathi uBhohazi kuRute, Uyeva na, ntombi yam? Musa ukuya kubhikica ntsimini yimbi; kananjalo uze ungadluli apha;  namathela wenjenje kumthinjana wam lo;

9.verse: amehlo akho makabe sentsimini oyivunayo wona, uwulandele;  yabona, abafana bakwam ndibawisele umthetho wokuba bangakuchukumisi; xa unxaniweyo, yiya ezityeni, usele into ekhiwe ngabafana.

10.verse: Wawa ngobuso bakhe, waqubuda emhlabeni, wathi kuye, Kutheni na ukuba ndibabalwe nguwe, undibuke, ndiyinkazana yolunye uhlanga nje?

11.verse: Waphendula uBhohazi, wathi kuye, Ndiyixelelwe kakuhle yonke into oyenzileyo kunyokozala, emva kokufa kwendoda yakho; ukuba ushiye uyihlo nonyoko, nelizwe owazalelwa kulo, weza ebantwini obungabazi ngaphambili.

12.verse: UYehova makakubuyekeze ukwenza kwakho, uzaliseke umvuzo wakho ovela kuYehova uThixo kaSirayeli, oze wazimela phantsi kwamaphiko akhe wena.

13.verse: Wathi yena, Mandibabalwe nguwe, nkosi yam; ngokuba undithuthuzele, ngokuba uthethe kakuhle nomkhonzazana wakho,  ndingenjengomnye wabakhonzazana bakho nje.

14.verse: Wathi uBhohazi kuye, Ngexesha lokudla sondela apha, udle isonka, uncinde iviniga ngeqhekeza lakho. Wahlala phantsi ngasecaleni labavuni. Wamnika ikhweba; wadla, wahlutha,  washiya.

15.verse: Wesuka ke waya kubhikica; uBhohazi waluwisela umthetho ulutsha olulolwakhe, wathi, Makabhikice naphakathi kwezithungu,  ningamdanisi;

16.verse: nimrholele nokumrholela inxenye ezithungwini, nishiye,  abhikice, ningamkhalimeli.

17.verse: Wabhikica entsimini leyo kwada kwahlwa; wayibhula into abeyibhikicile, yanga yiefa yerhasi.

18.verse: Wathwala, waya ekhaya; wayibona uninazala into ayibhikicileyo; wakurhola, wamnika abekushiyile akuba ehluthi.

19.verse: Wathi uninazala kuye, Ubhikice phi na namhla? Ubusebenza phi na? Makasikelelwe okubukileyo wena. Wamxelela uninazala umntu abesebenza kuye, wathi, Igama lendoda endisebenze kuyo namhla nguBhohazi.

20.verse: Wathi uNahomi kumolokazana wakhe, Makasikelelwe yena nguYehova, ongayekelelanga ukwenza inceba yakhe kwabaphilileyo nakwabafileyo. Wathi uNahomi kuye, Indoda leyo iyalamana nathi;  ingowabakhululi bethu.

21.verse: Wathi uRute umMowabhikazi, Kananjalo ithe yona kum, Uze unamathele kulutsha olulolwam, lude lulugqibe lonke uvuno olulolwam.

22.verse: Wathi uNahomi kuRute umolokazana wakhe, Kulungile, ntombi yam, ukuba uphume nomthinjana wakhe, ukuze ungafikelwa mntu ukwenye intsimi.

23.verse: Wanamathela kumthinjana kaBhohazi, wabhikica, kwada kwagqitywa ukuvunwa kwerhasi nokuvunwa kwengqolowa; wahlala noninazala.

1.verse: Wathi uNahomi uninazala kuye, Ntombi yam, ndingakufuneli na ukuphumla okokulungela?

2.verse: Kaloku akasihlobo sethu na uBhohazi, lowo umthinjana ubunawo? Nanko esela irhasi ngobu busuku esandeni.

3.verse: Zihlambe, uthambise, unxibe iingubo zakho, uhle uye esandeni. Uze ungazazisi endodeni leyo, ide igqibe ukudla nokusela.

4.verse: Wothi, ukulala kwayo phantsi, uqonde indawo eye kulala kuyo,  uye uyityhile ingubo ngasezinyaweni zayo, ulale phantsi;  yokuxelela ke yona into owoyenza.

5.verse: Wathi kuye, Yonke into oyithethayo ndoyenza.

6.verse: Wehla ke waya esandeni, wenza ngako konke abemwisele umthetho ngako uninazala.

7.verse: Wadla uBhohazi, wasela, yachwayitha intliziyo yakhe; waya walala phantsi ekupheleni kwentlaba. Waya ke ecotha, wamtyhila ingubo ngasezinyaweni zakhe, walala phantsi.

8.verse: Kwathi phakathi kobusuku, yothuka indoda leyo, yaguquka,  yabona kulele inkazana ngasezinyaweni zayo.

9.verse: Yathi, Ungubani? Wathi, NdinguRute, umkhonzazana wakho;  twabulula isondo lengubo yakho phezu komkhonzazana wakho,  ngokuba ungumkhululi wena.

10.verse: Yathi, Usikelelwe nguYehova, ntombi yam. Inceba yakho yamva nje ingaphezu kweyokuqala, ungalandelanga madodana nje, nokuba ngasweleyo nokuba nganobutyebi.

11.verse: Kaloku ke, ntombi yam, musa ukoyika; konke okuthethileyo ndokwenzela; ngokuba bonke abantu bomzi wakowethu bayazi ukuba uyinkazana enesidima.

12.verse: Ewe! Kuyinene, ndingumkhululi inyaniso. Ke kukho umkhululi osondeleyo kuwe kunam.

13.verse: Lala ngobu busuku; kothi kusasa, ukuba uthe wakukhulula ngentlawulelo, kulunge, makakukhulule ngentlawulelo; ke ukuba akathanga akunanze ukukukhulula ngentlawulelo, ndokukhulula ngentlawulelo mna, ehleli nje uYehova. Lala kude kuse.

14.verse: Walala ke ngasezinyaweni zakhe kwada kwasa; wavuka bengekanakanani abantu. Yathi, Makungaziwa ukuba bekuze inkazana esandeni.

15.verse: Yathi, Ethe ingubo yakho yokwaleka, ukhongozele.  Wakhongozela ke ngayo. Yalinganisa izilinganiso zerhasi ezithandathu, yamthwalisa; wagoduka.

16.verse: Waya kuninazala, wathi yena, Utheni, ntombi yam? Wamxelela konke emenzele khona indoda leyo.

17.verse: Wathi, Indinike ezi zilinganiso zerhasi; ngokuba yayisithi,  Musa ukuya kunyokozala ulambatha.

18.verse: Wathi, Hlala, ntombi yam, ude wazi okuya kuhla; kuba indoda leyo ayiyi kuphumla, ingakuphelisanga oku namhla.

1.verse: Ke kaloku wenyuka uBhohazi, waya esangweni lomzi, wahlala khona; nanko egqitha umkhululi lowa abethetha yena uBhohazi;  wathi, Wa, Nantsi, khawuphambukele apha, uhlale phantsi.

2.verse: Waphambuka, wahlala. Wathabatha ishumi lamadoda kumadoda amakhulu omzi, wathi, Hlalani apha; ahlala ke.

3.verse: Wathi kumkhululi lowo, Isahlulo somhlaba obungowomzalwana wethu uElimeleki, uthengise ngaso uNahomi, obuye elizweni lakwaMowabhi;

4.verse: ndathi ke mna, mandivule indlebe yakho, ndithi, Wuthenge ngaphambi kwaba bahleliyo apha, phambi kwamadoda amakhulu abantu bakowethu. Ukuba uyawukhulula ngentlawulelo, wukhulule ngentlawulelo; ukuba akuwukhululi ngentlawulelo, ndixelele ndazi; ngokuba akukho bani unokuwukhulula ngentlawulelo,  ingenguwe; ndisemva kwakho mna. Wathi, Ndowukhulula ngentlawulelo mna.

5.verse: Wathi uBhohazi, Mhlenikweni uwuzuzayo umhlaba esandleni sikaNahomi, uwuzuza nakuRute, umMowabhikazi, umkamfi, ukuba uvuse igama lomfi elifeni lakhe.

6.verse: Wathi umkhululi lowo, Andinakuzikhululela ngentlawulelo ngokwam, hleze ndilonakalise elam ilifa. Zikhululele ngentlawulelo isilunga sam eso; ngokuba andinako mna ukuwukhulula ngentlawulelo.

7.verse: Ke kaloku kwakusithiwa kudala kwaSirayeli, ukukhulula ngentlawulelo nokwanana, ukuze yonke into ibe iqiniselwe, ubani anyothule imbadada yakhe ayinike ummelwane wakhe; oko kwaye kububungqina kwaSirayeli.

8.verse: Wathi umkhululi lowo kuBhohazi, Zithengele. Wanyothula imbadada yakhe.

9.verse: Wathi ke uBhohazi kumadoda amakhulu nakubantu bonke,  Ningamangqina namhla, ukuba ndikuthengile konke okukaElimeleki,  nako konke okukaKiliyon noMalon, esandleni sikaNahomi;

10.verse: noRute umMowabhikazi, umkaMalon, ndimzuzile ukuba abe ngumkam, ukuze kuvuswe igama lomfi elifeni lakhe,  linganqanyulwa igama lomfi ebazalwaneni bakhe, nasesangweni lendawo yakhe: ningamangqina namhla.

11.verse: Bathi bonke abantu abasesangweni namadoda amakhulu,  Singamangqina. UYehova makamenze lo mfazi ungenayo endlwini yakho, abe njengoRakeli nanjengoLeya, abayakhayo indlu kaSirayeli bobabini, avelise amandla e-Efrata, akwenzele udumo eBhetelehem;

12.verse: indlu yakho ibe njengendlu kaPeretse, awamzalayo uTamare kuYuda, ngembewu leyo aya kukunika uYehova ngale ntombazana.

13.verse: UBhohazi wamzeka ke uRute waba ngumkakhe, wamngena; waza uYehova wamnika ukuzala; wazala unyana.

14.verse: Bathi abafazi kuNahomi, Makabongwe uYehova ongakuyekelanga uswele umkhululi namhla; igama lakhe malivakale kwaSirayeli;

15.verse: abe ngumbuyisi womphefumlo kuwe, nomnqaki wezimvi zakho;  ngokuba umolokazana wakho okuthandayo, lowo ulungileyo kuwe ngaphezu koonyana abasixhenxe, umzele.

16.verse: UNahomi wamthabatha umntwana lowo, wambeka esifubeni sakhe,  waba ngumondli wakhe.

17.verse: Lwamthiya igama ummelwanekazi, lwathi, UNahomi uzalelwe unyana, lwathi igama lakhe nguObhedi; yena nguyise kaYese,  uyise kaDavide.

18.verse: Yiyo le ke inzala kaPeretse: uPeretse wazala uHetseron;

19.verse: uHetseron wazala uRam; uRam wazala uAminadabhi;

20.verse: uAminadabhi wazala uNashon; uNashon wazala uSalemon;

21.verse: uSalemon wazala uBhohazi; uBhohazi wazala uObhedi;

22.verse: UObhedi wazala uYese; uYese wazala uDavide.
